channel.title: Barrage wont freeze sometimes. Especially if their running away/walking sometime
channel.description: Well, on my server barrage will sometimes not freeze someone if they are walking away from you. I'm sure theirs a easy way to fix this. If anyone can help that would be great! :cool: Base is Bluescap3.

item.title: Barrage wont freeze sometimes. Especially if their running away/walking sometime
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Generally, you have to go and edit the barrage action timer in client.java. Just look for that, and edit the action timer factors (when it is applied, and the exceptions). That should work, if not, I’ll see what I can do.

I’m turning in for the night, but stay open for other help.

Best Regards,

FatWallet

Read full topic
item.source: Barrage wont freeze sometimes. Especially if their running away/walking sometime
